unnormalised: Planning a trip to Vaishno Devi! Heard you gotta register online first, right? Also, is it still 13 km up the hill from Katra, or have they improved the roads? My nani wants to go but she's 75 yrs old, so thinking of booking a helicopter for her. Anyone know the current rates? Last I checked it was around Rs. 2000 per person, but that was pre-pandemic. Also, is October a good time to visit, or will it be too crowded for Navratri?
normalised: Planning a trip to Vaishno Devi! Heard you got to register online first, right? Also, is it still thirteen kilometer up the hill from Katra, or have they improved the roads? My nani wants to go but she is seventy five years old, so thinking of booking a helicopter for her. Anyone know the current rates? Last I checked it was around rupee two thousand per person, but that was pre-pandemic. Also, is October a good time to visit, or will it be too crowded for Navratri?
